data.title: WE WANNA THANK YOU
meta_keywords: WE WANNA THANK YOU Big Brovaz
data.meta_description: Big Brovaz - We Wanna Thank You (Letra y canción para escuchar) - This is a little song that / We wrote for you / Just for everything that / You are and you do / We wanna thank you (wanna thank you / We wanna thank you /
data.text:
This is a little song that

We wrote for you

Just for everything that

You are and you do

We wanna thank you (wanna thank you)

We wanna thank you

Aint nobody got my back like you

Or rap like you,

Or show a dog love like you

Somehow you can turn

My grey sky blue

When im having a bad day

You get me through

I appriciate you

And all the things you do

Plus i love and respect you too

And thats why

Drop a bomb everytime

That im cutin a song

Ill let them know that

It's goona be on

I just trying to say thank you

I sit here thinkin about (you)

If you wernt here what would i do ?

You know i need you around (me)

Without your love where

Would i be

I feel

Even though im far away

You are next to me

So real

All the loving your giving me

It makes me just wanna say

[CHORUS]

Thank you for the things you do

You pick me when i was down

Thank you for the joy you bring

Yeah you turned my life around

I wanna say thank you

For being there for me through everything

Thank you

For letting me be myself once again

You always come at the right times

With the right words

Make me feel fine

Even when im hert

And when some hate

You show that you love me

On your mind all the time

Thinking of me

Thats how i know that you truly care

Anything i go through

I know youll be there

As long as you love me

I aint going nowhere

Cuz youre all i need

I swear i really wanna

Thank you

How do i thank you for the

Things that youve done for me

I cant exlain the joy it brings

To my world your my world

Your my everything

Since the beginning youve been there for me

So i sing this song to you

For all that you do

I just wnna say thank you

[CHORUS]

Thank you for the things you do

You pick me up when i was down

Thank you for the joy you bring

Yeah you turned my life around

I wanna say thank you

For being there for me through everything

Thank you

For letting me be myself

Once again

This is a little song that

We wrote for you

Just for everything that

You are and you do

We wanna thank you (wanna thank you)

We wanna thank you (everything that you)

Just for being there for us

When we wre down and out

For all the little words that

You said out your mouth

We wanna thank you (wanna thank you)

We wanna thank you (everything that you)

When im feeling down

You are always there to pick the pieces

And place me on my feet again

When your time comes around

Just know that ill be there

If you need me

You can me for anything

[CHORUS]

Thank you for the things you do

You pick me up when i was down

Thank you for the joy you bring

Yeah you turned my life around

I wanna say thank you

For being there for me through everything

Thank you

For letting me be myself

Once again

Thank you for the things you do

You pick me up when i was down

Thank you for the joy you bring

Yeah you turned my life around

I wanna say thank you

For being there for me through everything

Thank you

For letting me be myself

Once again

This is a little song that

We wrote for you

Just for everything that

You are and you do

We wanna thank you (wanna thank you)

We wanna thank you (everything that you)

Just for being there for us

When we wre down and out

For all the little words that

You said out your mouth

We wanna thank you (wanna thank you)

We wanna thank you (everything that you)

Yeahhh!!
